title: Ticket #2693: Include subdag external nodes in parent DAG's node status file
description:
Bill just asked me for this -- he wants to use the node status files in his SOAR workflows, and he'd like to have a single node status file for an entire workflow, even if that workflow has subdag externals in it.

We need to think about this carefully before we do it, though. There are some issues such as:

  • What to do about possible node name collisions (maybe prefix the node names with the subdag name, as we do for splices?).
  • Does this idea even really make sense?
  • What will happen when nodes are added to the node status file when a subdag is run? Currently, the list of files in the node status file never changes. Will changes break any code that relies on the node status file?
  • How would this be implemented? That may be a little tricky...
